welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tapachula, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture, vibrant culture, and delicious coffee. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your stay."

restaurants.name: Sensei Sushi Bar
restaurants.description: Sensei Sushi Bar is a sushi restaurant located in Tapachula.

restaurants.name: Domino's Pizza
restaurants.description: Domino's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Tapachula.

restaurants.name: Buenos Diaz Coffee
restaurants.description: Buenos Diaz Coffee is a café located in Tapachula.

restaurants.description: Sonora's Meat is a steakhouse located in Tapachula.

restaurants.name: El Mito-T
restaurants.description: El Mito-T is a taco restaurant located in Tapachula.
restaurants.address: 4a. avenida Sur #133 (entre 20A. y 22A. Pte.), 30700 Tapachula, Chiapas

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tapachula International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
